channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why Mark Zuckerberg Is Ditching Human Fact-Checkers
item.description: This week, we take a look at Meta's new era of content moderation.
